game.name: Color Fear
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 당신이 경험하게 될 가장 무서운 공포 게임. 오늘 The Color Fun Coloring Show에서는 시청자 여러분의 도움을 받아 집에 누가 침입했는지 알아내세요! The Color Fun Coloring Show에서 펼쳐지는 침입자들과 공포에 맞서 매일 밤 살아남으세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Scariest Horror game you will ever experience. Today on The Color Fun Coloring Show they want viewers to help them find out who is breaking into their house! Survive each night against the Intruders and the Horror that comes from The Color Fun Coloring Show!
